code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";export var chatSlice=createSlice({name:"chat",initialState:{chatId:null,chatName:null},reducers:{setChat:function setChat(state,action){state.chatId=action.payload.chatId;state.chatName=action.payload.chatName;}}});var setChat=chatSlice.actions.setChat;export{setChat};export var selectChatId=function selectChatId(state){return state.chat.chatId;};export var selectChatName=function selectChatName(state){return state.chat.chatName;};export default chatSlice.reducer;
